Recently a situation came to the attention of the Northview Athletic Department that we would like to address with our community.

A local business was solicited by a third party company based in Texas and was told that NHS was doing a fundraiser by putting their business logo on a souvenir cup and selling the cup. In good faith, the business graciously provided their logo and the fee and was happy to support NHS. However, NHS had never been a part of this fundraising effort. NHS does not utilize this third party solicitation style for fundraising.

It is unfortunate that in this day of non-stop robo-calling from scammers across the country have now stooped to lying about fundraising for a local high school athletics.

If you, or your business, is approached by a suspicious fundraising company claiming to represent Northview High School, please call Scott Buell or Bethany Jones at (812) 448-2661.

Thank you,
Chris Mauk- Principal
Scott Buell- Boys Athletic Director
Bethany Jones- Girls Athletic Director
